name: Ramen
description: A popular Japanese noodle soup with a rich, savory broth, typically topped with slices of pork, boiled eggs, green onions, and bamboo shoots.
steps: Prepare the broth by simmering chicken or pork bones with onions, garlic, and ginger.
Strain the broth and season with soy sauce, miso, or salt.
Cook ramen noodles separately until just tender.
In bowls, arrange cooked noodles, then pour hot broth over them.
Top with slices of pork belly, soft-boiled eggs, green onions, and bamboo shoots.
tips: For a richer flavor, simmer the broth for several hours.
Add a drop of sesame oil to each bowl before serving for added aroma.
Customize toppings according to preference, such as adding corn or butter.
